name: Porcunipine (itch)
description:
Porcunipine is a couch multiplayer about balding porcupines fighting courageously for survival using their very last pointy hairs.

Have fun with the early access and help the developers make a better Porcunipine! =)


- 3 game modes, 30 Arenas and 7 playable Characters ;
- Singleplayer and Multiplayer modes;
- 7 cute playable characters;
- Tough Bots with human-like assholeness;
- Full Xbox360 gamepad support (other gamepads as well);
- Awesome music by the swedish artist goto80 and Gabriel Naro;
- One character has his butt cheeks showing off in battle.

You can also play Porcunipine's original singleplayer concept that was conceived in the womb of Ludum Dare #28 which theme was "You only get one." Just Check it on Kongregate.

And Hey! If you are a brazilian having trouble with PayPal, you can get it on Splitplay , obrigado!
